Uses of Package
org.tigris.noodle

Packages that use org.tigris.noodle
org.tigris.noodle   
org.tigris.noodle.filters   
 

Classes in org.tigris.noodle used by org.tigris.noodle
FilterSet
          This class is responsible for loading a set of NoodleFilters from a Properties object and making them available in the correct order.
NoodleData
          NoodleData is a per-request container containing the stage of one proxied request, and the logic to stream that request to the client.
NoodleException
           
NoodleFilter
          Those who want to Noodle can Noodle with NoodleFilters.
NoodleReader
          NoodleReader is an interface which provides for an object which encapsulates the logic of taking an HttpResponse object and reading blocks of bytes from it.
NoodleResponseFilter
          Those who want to Noodle can Noodle with NoodleFilters.
ProxyModule
          Proxy a request for Noodle.
ResponseBlock
